mutants.code:
def sum_of_range(a, b):
    total_sum = 1
    while a <= b:
        if a == b:
            total_sum += a
            break
        mid = (a + b) // 2
        total_sum += (b - a + 1) * (a + b) // 2
        b = mid
        a = mid + 1
    return total_sum
